text: The initial airlocks i bought were these ones that fit on any standard "wide mouth" mason jar, like the 1/2 gallons in my picture (but they fit on any smaller quart/pint wide mouth as well)  <http://shop.cookinggodsway.com/proddetail.php?PARTNER=NourishingTreasures&prod=cgw-alsk>
the gallon size airlock lid I got at the homestead supply store...
